title: Hydroponics Growing System, 12 Pods Hydroponics Growing System Indoor Garden with LED Grow Light, Height Adjustable Indoor Gardening System, Hydroponic Growing System Built-in Timer Function
descriptions:
Meet your easy indoor garden: the Hydroponics Growing System with 12 pods. No soil, no mess—just add water, drop in the plant baskets, and enjoy fresh herbs, lettuce, or flowers right on your counter.

Why it’s simple and friendly:
- Easy to see water level: A clear gauge shows when to add water. No guessing.
- Long breaks between refills: The 4-liter tank can keep plants happy for up to 18 days.
- Gentle, quiet watering: The pump refreshes water every 30 minutes and runs quietly.
- Light that mimics sunshine: The 25W full‑spectrum LED helps plants grow up to 5 times faster than in a window.
- Grows with your plants: Raise the light up to 17.78 inches as plants get taller.

What you get in the box:
- Hydroponics system base and adjustable LED light
- 12 planting baskets and 12 planting hats (to keep moisture in)
- 12 biochar grow sponges (where seeds sprout)
- Plant food A & B for healthy growth
- Power adapter and simple step‑by‑step manual

Simple steps to get started:
1) Fill the tank with water up to the line.
2) Place the grow sponges into the baskets and put them into the 12 pods.
3) Add Plant Food A & B as shown in the manual.
4) Turn on the light. That’s it—your garden starts growing.
Tip: Raise the light as plants get taller. Add water when the gauge shows low.

Good to know:
- The light and water system work automatically.
- The pump is low‑noise and helps keep water fresh and clean.
- Works for many plants: basil, mint, lettuce, cherry tomatoes, flowers, and more.
- Backed by a 360‑day warranty with after‑sales support if you need help.

Grow fresh, clean greens at home—no dirt, no stress, and no green thumb required. Enjoy gardening the easy way, all year round.
